welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elkton, where small town charm meets big city possibilities! Get ready to experience our picturesque landscapes, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and create unforgettable memories in our vibrant city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is the newest addition to Chestercounty Carlson Airport, providing a modern and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.
